hey friend welcome back to the DMS craft
today we're doing our last build for the shadows of the dust queen a

Queen's face show up in the mirror lighted face so that's why I'm using

drinking and everything in the mold but I really didn't find that to be a

inch as opposed to two inches on the larger part
goody use those templates we just made to make tracings on this ready board the

now that I have all these constructed front to back I want to make the panels

then measured it out cut it out of the foam core pulled off the paper and then
I also use the template drew inside the template to get kind of a a ring around

some bricks blocks in the center at kind of random angles so I thought that was a

brush technique you put a little bit of paint on the on the brush and just kind
of pull it over the surface and you're just trying to get a little bit on there
you're not trying to fill it in or anything and see all those highlights
are starting to pop out they're kind of hidden with the black there but when you
do this it kind of pops all those nice little highlight
that you made out of the piece and just a super easy technique and use it all

core you'll get a little of a bit a bit of abandon so you can see here we got
